topic.title: EMS Patient Heart Rate - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-EmergencyRunReport-106)
SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] methodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet EMSTEMPVS_014 NEMSIS STATIC (CONF-EmergencyRunReport-107)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-EmergencyRunReport-106)
SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] methodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet EMSTEMPVS_014 NEMSIS STATIC (CONF-EmergencyRunReport-107)
